Translations.Text: Ni dang zansong ni zhigao zhu de daming chaojue wanwu
ta chuangzao wanwu bing shi ge wu yunchen
Ta yuding wanwu, er jiayi yindao
Ta shengchu mucao
ranhou shi ta bian cheng heise de kucao
Wo jiang shi ni songdu, gu ni bu hui wangji
chufei an la suo yu wangji de. Ta dique zhidao xianzhu de he yin wei de yanxing
Wo jiang shi ni zunxun pingyi de daolu
gu ni dang jiaohui zhongren, ruguo jiaohui you bi yu tamen dehua
Wei zhu de ren, jiang juewu
boming de ren, jiang tuibi
ta jiang ru yu dahuo
ranhou, zai huo li busi ye bu huo
Chunjie zhe biding chenggong
ta jinian ta de zhu de zun ming, er jin shou bai gong
Buran, nimen que xuanze jinshi de shenghuo
qishi, houshi shi geng hao de, shi geng changjiu de
Zhe que shi zai zai gu jingdian zhong de
zai zai yi bo la xin he mu sa de jingdian zhong de
Da zai de xiaoxi, que yi jianglin nile
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren shi gongjing de
laodong de, xinku de
tamen jiang ru liehuo
jiang yin fei quan
tamen meiyou shiwu, dan you jingji
ji bu fei ren, you buneng chongji
zai na ri, jiang you xuduo ren, shi xiangfu de
shi wei qi laoji er yukuai de
tamen jiang zai chonggao de leyuan zhong
ting bu dao e yan
limian you liu quan
limian you gao ta
you chenshezhe de bei zhan
you pailiezhe de kaozhen
you puzhankai de rong tan
Nandao tamen bu guancha ma? Luotuo shi zenyang zaocheng de
tian shi zenyang bei sheng gao de
shanluan shi zenyang bei shuli qi de
dadi shi zenyang bei zhan kai de
Ni dang jiaohui, ni zhishi jiaohui (tamen de)
ni jue bushi jiancha tamen de
dan shei zhuanshen li qu erqie bu xinjiao
an la jiang yi zuida de xingfa chengzhi shei
Tamen biding zhi guiyu wo
tamen de jihe, biding you wo fuze
Shi yi liming
yu shi ye
yu oushu he jishu
yu li qu de heiye
duiyu you lizhi zhe, ci zhong you yi zhong mengshi ma
Nandao ni bu zhidao ni de zhu zenyang chengzhi a de ren——
you gao zhu de yi lai mu ren ma
Xiang nayang de ren, zai bie de chengshi li hai meiyou bei chuangzaoguo de——
zenyang chengzhi zai shangu li zao shi wei jia de sai mo de ren
zenyang chengzhi you wuli de falao
Zhe deng ren ceng zai guo zhong fangsi
nai duo xing bu yi
gu ni de zhu ba yi zhong xingfa, qingzhu zai tamen shenshang
Ni de zhu, que shi jianshi de
Zhiyu ren, dang ta de zhu kaoyan ta, gu youdai ta, erqie shi taguo anyi de shenghuo de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu youdai wole.”
Dang ta kaoyan ta, gu jieyue ta de jiyang de shihou, ta shuo:“Wo de zhu lingru wole.”
Jue buran! Dan nimen bu youdai gu'er
nimen bu yi jipin xiang mianli
nimen qintun yichan
nimen ku'ai qiancai
Jue buran! Dang dadi zhendong fu zhendong
ni de zhu he zhenglie zhenglie de tianshi, tong qi lailin de shihou
zai na ri, huo yu jiang bei na lai; zai na ri, ren jiang juewu, dan juewu yu ta you he biyi ne
Ta jiang shuo:“Dan yuan wo zaishi de shihou ceng xingshanshi.”
Zai na ri, renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong xingfa chengzhi bieren
renhe ren, buyong ta di na zhong shufu shufu bieren
Anding de linghun a
Ni yingdang xiyue de, bei xiyue de guiyu ni de zhu
Ni yingdang ru zai wo de zhong pu li
ni yingdang ru zai wo de leyuan li
